hero.title: DevTalk
hero.subtitle: Talk Code. Share Knowledge. Grow Together.

features.title: Everything you need is here
features.description: DevTalk gives you all the tools you need to stay connected, focused, and in sync.

realtime.title: Real-time Chat
realtime.desc: Chat without delay – messages appear instantly so conversations stay in sync.

threads.title: Channels
threads.desc: Keep every discussion organized with dedicated channels for your conversations.

snippets.title: Code Snippets
snippets.desc: Share clean, readable code directly in chat – perfectly formatted and easy to discuss.

security.title: Security
security.desc: Your data stays safe with built-in protection and secure access at every step.

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.desc: Never miss a beat – get instant alerts when someone tags you or sends a message.

github.title: GitHub SSO
github.desc: Log in instantly with your GitHub account – no extra steps, no friction.

signin.title: Sign in with GitHub
signin.desc: Log in with ease using your GitHub account. Don't have an account? No problem!
signin.signUp: Sign up for a free GitHub account to get started.

join.title: Join a channel
join.desc: Find a channel for your favorite dev topics and join the conversation.

share.title: Share code & get help
share.desc: Post code-snippets, ask questions, and learn from other developers in real time.

cta.title: Ready to connect with other developers?
cta.description: Join DevTalk today to start your coding-adventure!

team.title: The Team Behind DevTalk
team.description: A small team of passionate dev-students building a place for coders to connect, learn, and grow.
